data.text:
Multi Grammy Award winning producer Clive Davis looks like he mixes business with pleasure as he chats on his cell phone and sits on a beach lounger with with papers and a Time magazine on his lap. After all his years in the business Davis, 78, still plays an active in the careers of Alicia Keys, Rod Stewart, Leona Lewis, Barry Manilow and Whitney Houston. Miami, FL. 11/27/10.

Captions are provided by our contributors.
